text: Krasny Yar () is a rural locality (a selo) and the administrative center of Krasnoyarsky Selsoviet, Ufimsky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 1,615 as of 2010. There are 20 streets. == Geography == It is located 25 km from Ufa. == References == Category:Rural localities in Ufimsky District
title: Krasny Yar, Ufimsky District, Republic of Bashkortostan
